attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what was going on with out president, and when I tapped on the app, I immediately started barfing... profusely. I thought it was just something I ate until I realized other people were Barfing profusely as well. Stay safe out there.

I downloaded this app to help out 🍊 president out because he needs the support. But the app took like 5 days too download and no wonder because 🍊 is really slow at everything 😋. But I couldn’t do anything it took forever!! 

DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: don’t download

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app it took 3 weeks to download, i opened the app and my phone started smelling really weird and then i continued to catch of fire I had to put it out with my bare hands no I have third degree burns. Overall this app is terrible 0/10.
attributes.title: THIS APP MADE MY PHONE CATCH OF FIRE🤬🤬

attributes.review: I had such low expectations to begin with, but when i opened the app, i saw TRUMP HIMSELF, twerking naked on a wall. This is simply unacceptable. His two inches flopping in the wind brought me to tears- i will be entering a therapy group to rid my eyes of the horrible, orange chode i have seen. WOULD NOT recommend to anybody. My only question is how DARE you?!?
attributes.title: INAPPROPRIATE!!!

attributes.review: This app is really awful, taking your personal information, selling it to third parties that ALSO steal your information. It just doesn’t stop and causes so many unfixable problems. I truly feel bad for any fool who gets this app
attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible! DON’T GET THE APP!!

attributes.review: Downloaded this on my grandmas phone. As soon as i opened to app it sent huge shock waves through my grandmothers body and she had a heart attack and died within 1 minute. Please do not put your family in harms way for this app.
attributes.title: Thanks for killing my grandma 🙄

attributes.review: Ok first it took forever to download then when it finally downloaded it was glitchy and kept kicking me off this app is a disgrace to all the apps in the whole App Store and lets not for get its completely useless
attributes.title: This is horrible

attributes.review: this app is terrible and let me tell you why. my grandma got so traumatized with this app that every time she hears the name “trump” (gag) she has a seizure. i’m NOT joking !! this app deserves to be taken down. also it’s trump. so i don’t have to explain myself 😙😙 !!
attributes.title: hate it.. don’t download/ traumatized my granny

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I am a racist homophobic boomer, but it took two DAYS to download and when it did the app hacked my phone!😫 Now my camera roll is filled with our presidents nudes😭. It also deleted all of my existing apps! I do NOT suggest getting this app! 🧚‍♂️💫✨🌈

This is going to sound ridiculous but somehow every time I open this app it smells like actual garbage🤢. I know, I couldn't understand it either but Trump had to program this app to smell awful despite his supporters. Stan Bernie
attributes.title: I didn’t know apps could smell.
